description: Ikat woman's coat in dark maroon with abstract patterns in gold, green, light blue, red and cream; reverse (lining) side is flower printed fabric in rusty red colors and cream background with band of horizontal striped fabric at bottom; sleeves are straight out from and fuller at shoulders and narrower at wrists; egg white glazing on fabric is particularly apparent on the sleeves; all edges embroidered in blue, coral and cream
title: Coat
